caption.center: PEOPLE State of Illinois, petitioner, v. Devonte TAYLOR, respondent.

opinion.opinion_text:
Petition for leave to appeal denied.
In the exercise of this Court's supervisory authority, the judgment of the Appellate Court, Second District, in case Nos. 2-97-0463 and 2-97-0464, is vacated. The appellate court is directed to reconsider its judgment in light of People v. Linder et al., case Nos. 83415 and 84014 cons., 1999 WL 77551, ___ Ill.2d ___, ___ Ill.Dec. ___, ___ N.E.2d ___ (February 19, 1999).
RATHJE, J., took no part.
